title: Commending M & T Bank upon the occasion of receiving the Corporate Bell Award from the Mental Health Association in Orange County, Inc.
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending  M  &  T  Bank  upon the occasion of
receiving the Corporate Bell Award from the Mental Health Association in
Orange County, Inc. on February 5, 2011

WHEREAS, Businesses which  bring  greater  awareness  to  mental  health
issues,  and  assist  people  with  mental  illnesses in their quest for
dignity and independence, are a great benefit to the health and  welfare
of all citizens; and
  WHEREAS,  From time to time, society calls upon these businesses to be
honored for the significance  of  their  contributions  and  efforts  to
assist  others, recognizing they are deserving of the highest praise and
acclamation; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to commend M
& T Bank upon the occasion of receiving the Corporate  Bell  Award  from
the Mental Health Association in Orange County, Inc. to be celebrated at
its  Annual Silver Ball on Saturday, February 5, 2011, at the Round Hill
House in Washingtonville, New York; and
  WHEREAS, This prestigious honor will be presented to M  &  T  Bank  in
recognition  of  its  many  years  of  significant support to the Mental
Health Association in Orange County and  its  unwavering  assistance  in
helping the agency achieve its mission; and
  WHEREAS, Due to the dedicated efforts of M & T Bank, the Mental Health
Association in Orange County, Inc. has been able to offer many programs,
support  groups  and  assistance  to  Orange County residents who have a
mental illness, developmental disability and/or are  victims  of  crime;
and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative Body is very pleased to have this opportu-
nity to salute M & T Bank for its long history  of  purposeful  endeavor
which has greatly benefited its community, and to wish this worthy busi-
ness continued success in future years; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commend M & T Bank upon the occasion of  receiving  the  Corporate  Bell
Award  from the Mental Health Association in Orange County, Inc.; and be
it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to M & T Bank.
